title: Disconnect from chat
body: Just today I have been disconnecting from chat in the client. I do not have any problems with my ping or disconnecting in game but just this chat is effecting me because I cannot call a role in normals. I have tried restarting my computer and client and have looked online for solutions and as of yet nothing has helped so I was wondering if anyone else had some solutions or is having the same problem. Please help me :C

replies.body: I am having the same problem.  It has been ongoing for a couple months now.  My ISP is Telstra.

Hey Andyroo,

What ISP are you with?  Is the problem still happening today?

Cheers
Mindstar
